website_summaries.verdict: This deluxe collapsible cart is sure to serve you well both now and in the future.
pros: Cart weighs only about 10 pounds and offers a weight capacity of 150 pounds
Polyester construction guarantees the cart can withstand snow, sleet, rain, and other inclement weather conditions
Fits perfectly inside a closet or car trunk
cons: Corner seams tend to come apart
Very small in comparison to similar carts

customer_reviews.title: This wagon helps me a lot to transfer stuffs while ...
customer_reviews.text: This wagon helps me a lot to transfer stuffs while making deliveries. What I think is worth it for the price and quality speaking.
customer_reviews.author: D. Natan

customer_reviews.title: TOY CART
customer_reviews.text: A tiny little toy cart . Not a regular size cart like Mac etc. but cost the same or more. I would like to give zero, just for the time waste!
customer_reviews.author: Rudaleholt

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight, compact wagon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little wagon! I'm disabled and can't lift more than ten lbs, I use the wagon to carry my groceries from the car to the inside of my home. It fits through doorways easily and holds bagfulls of items. It folds up easily, is light weight and compact for a wagon. I'd recommend it to anyone. There is nothing to assemble, it's ready to use straight from the box. I bought a wagon that I got a discount on because it was in a damaged box but it was in perfect shape! It was a great value for a great wagon!
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Roomy! Medium weight.  Very easy to fold/unfold.
customer_reviews.text: Roomy! 16.5 x 26.5 interior snuggly fits two banker's boxes next to each other. See pic. Great for dorm move-in and gardening; will want to protect fabric. Medium weight, but feels sturdy. Quite a bit lighter than other brands! Super easy and quick to fold and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Cairographics

customer_reviews.title: Love this blue wagon.
customer_reviews.text: When I go visit my aunt in the nursing home, out of state, I bring my briefcase, soft ice chest, duffel bag, small step stool, and a bag of things for her. Before I was carrying many of these items at one time, and my arms, shoulders, and back would hurt for a week after I got back home. This trip was much better because of the wagon. I would load all of my small items to get to the hotel room, and when visiting at the nursing home. I did realize that it does not roll as easily on carpet, as on tile floors. When loading the car to leave the hotel, the wagon got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: jp777

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I purchase this from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: After buying all other types of carts from wire to plastic carts, I come across this one and I feel like I missed out. So many grocery trips that I struggled with in past to the point one of them broke 3 feet away from coming home. This is definitely a life changer and I’m so grateful for the cart I can’t help but adore it when I go shopping with it lol!! I can carry a lot of items and do less trips to the store. LA doesn’t have the best sidewalks but this cart conquers them all. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: excellent utility and very easy to use and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: is the envy of people anywhere i go with it - costco, at work hauling computer equipment, etc. the fold-down, open-up is nearly instantaneous and it's very steardy and easy to pull, turn, whatever you want to do with it. wheels are big enough to provide easy transportation even if full. canvas is durable and thick enough to the eye even. very compact and light weight in the car. Expanded it holds a good amount of stuff no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for antiquing and yard sales!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my mom, who is an avid shopper at antique fairs, yard sales, estate sales, etc. She runs an Etsy store, and is always looking for a good buy, and this cart has severed her quite well thus far. She says it sets up and breaks down super easily, allows her to carry quite a bit of junk, and navigates through crowds well. The other regular shoppers keep asking her where she got it!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Wagon folding cart
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good buy for because it's very useful for my grocery shopping. I don't need to make several trips to my car putting boxes or loads of items inside the house. This carries all my goods and can handle the weight esp. gallons of milk, Water and the like. It fits in my car so space is not a problem. People take a second look when they see it. I really like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nonie M

customer_reviews.title: YSC Wagon Garden Folding Utility Shopping Cart,Beach Red (Navy Blue)
customer_reviews.text: This YSC Wagon Garden Folding Utility Shopping Cart,Beach Red (Navy Blue) Is great for carrying groceries from the car to the house and even moving groceries around inside the house. Very nice! It folds up and unfolds very quickly too and has a good carry handle on it. The material it is made of is very strong and durable and not cheap in any way. ( WARNING!!! ) If you have very young kids I am sure they will be wanting you to give them rides in it!
customer_reviews.author: OhioShopper

customer_reviews.title: best cart on the market
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to replace the four-wheel metal shopping carts that you see everywhere, and what an improvement! These carts fold up with no chance of fingers getting pinched and easily hang from ladder hooks. It is seriously sturdy and does not require a liner to keep items from falling through the structure of the cart. Also it is maneuverable and the handle can be used in 2 positions. Everyone at the store asks "where did you get that cart?"
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold/unfold and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon. Bought it for my delivery job but I think it’d be perfect for my girls to cart Girl Scout cookies around the neighborhood too. It folds and unfolds super easy and is lightweight. One day I loaded it pretty heavily and one of the wheels started to squeak, but the noise went away after I unloaded it. I’m really happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: DBurns

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I dont even have little kids anymore but I do have a son who plays baseball and there is nothing more annoying than having to carry chairs, treats, blankets, and so on to the field. The wagon makes hauling crap much easier. Super easy to fold up but it is a little cheaper and the quality reflects that. It's still awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: Aubz Bevan

customer_reviews.title: Handle is short and not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: 1) The handle is short and not comfortable. I recommend to buy one with circle handle. 2) The wagon height was little shorter than I had expected. 3) The red button which collapse the telescope handle didn't work smoothly and looked not durable. I really liked the weight but I returned it immediately due what I wrote.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Nikravan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for unpacking groceries from the car and events where carrying lots of stuff is needed, such as water parks. Handle could be longer or extend to improve the product, as well as more outside pockets. Otherwise a very worthwhile purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Knighton

customer_reviews.title: ... done quite a few public events now and it's great to have the cart
customer_reviews.text: I've done quite a few public events now and it's great to have the cart. I wouldn't use it for farm tasks but it's sturdy enough for exhibitions and shows. Folding down into my car is great. The handle and stuff works well. I like that the handle adjusts. It folds down pretty easily. It doesn't fold super small but it certainly fits in the car OK.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Useful little wagon that fits neatly in the car.
customer_reviews.text: Useful little wagon that fits neatly in the car. Have used several times to haul heavy groceries into the house with no problems, and to haul lawn chairs and such around to parades. Doubles as a handy place to hold your jacket or purse or drinks on such occasions, rather than having to hold those items on your lap or place them on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: GIS

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Wagon
customer_reviews.text: Great wagon! Took a trip and this wagon paid for itself the first day! Used it to unload our suitcases and miscellaneous items that we took to our hotel room. I was amazed at how much you could carry in the wagon. Also, used it to roll our granddaughter in it at an outside event. It is light weight but very sturdy. It opens and closes in one easy step plus has a carrying handle when folded. I would highly recommend this item to anyone who wishes to have a portable wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Problem with handle extension
customer_reviews.text: The extendable handle has release buttons so it can slide back down for storage. Mine is defective and will not release the handle. It is stuck in the extended position and has caused problems getting the wagon in and out of car due to the handle length. Otherwise everything else about the wagon has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Kuts

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned mine for a little less than a month and used it about three times. It works great, however I just used it for groceries, and I haven’t really used the full capacity. I really liked it however and I haven’t had a problem, it’s easy to use and becomes really handy. Carrying groceries up to the 4th floor no more! Hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: This makes grocery shopping amazing. I can get more than a couple bags ...
customer_reviews.text: This wagon has been a life saver for me. I just moved to Seattle and am walking everywhere i need to go. This makes grocery shopping amazing. I can get more than a couple bags of stuff now without worrying about how to get it home! I also use it to get my recycling to the community bin, so I'm taking one trip instead of five. I get compliments on it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: xenasculee

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this cart!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cart my two small dogs around (19lbs each) and they tend to get very lazy on long walks. I actually use this for everything. I’ve used it to bring groceries in from the car, to move big packages from the mailroom to my apartment, take trash down to the trash room, anything! I would absolutely recommend this cart to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this cart
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cart! I deliver groceries and it saves me tons of footsteps and wear and tear on my back! For two days we have been clearing out our house to prepare for laying new carpet and this little cart has been INCREDIBLE! Many of my customers have asked about it and have ordered one to cart their grandchildren around the neighborhood parks. It is the BEST investment I've made in a very long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: CelticGrace

customer_reviews.title: it’s easy to flip over when loaded
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is way too small, and wheels are also too small, not stable and safe to maneuver. Never put your kid and valuables in this wagon, it’s easy to flip over when loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Makes Life Easier!
customer_reviews.text: Carries a ton of groceries. I used it to move to an upstairs apartment and it held boxes and heavy duty items. So easy to steer. Sturdy and well made. Good investment for an older lady.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Half the Weight, More Compact than  Similar Wagons. Shoddy Handle!
customer_reviews.text: downgraded my review from 5 stars to 3, because I've had two of these carts now, and both times the 'grip' has snapped off, 1/2 at a time. It's difficult to fix, and makes pulling the wagon uncomfortable. Otherwise - Half the weight of similar sized carts (mainly due to smaller tires, which are more than adequate for city life), and more compact. Handle tends to fall out of "clamp" when extended, which is annoying, but other than that, it's close to perfect.
customer_reviews.author: superscribe

customer_reviews.title: It's light weight and easy to open and close & has a solid bottom.  Perfect for keeping in the car.
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight and easy to open and close and it has a solid bottom. I keep it in the car and use it to haul groceries into the house. I got it so that I could stack 2 cat carriers in it and pull them into the vet's office. My cat carriers weight about 5 lbs each and the cats are 16 and 19 lbs, so they get a little heavy to carry and hard to maneuver through doors.
customer_reviews.author: L. Forrer

customer_reviews.title: ... haul in artwork and displays for art shows I love it. It doesn't take up a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to haul in artwork and displays for art shows I love it. It doesn't take up a lot of space, was easy to use, and steer and did exactly what I needed it to do! Shipped cheaper than other options and was more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: lawalker

customer_reviews.title: The folding wagon worked great. It was exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: The folding wagon worked great. It was exactly what we expected. It folds up very easily, is light and portable, and holds a great deal of stuff. It's also very maneuverable. Well worth the investment! It also works well on escalators (surprisingly)!
customer_reviews.author: B. Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when I first got it. Although the extended piece is a little short for a 5'10" human. I still loved it. That was until about 2 months in when it started making this horrid screeching noise when you pull it. For the price, you would think it would be better oiled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this wagon
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Used it when we went camping to take everything we needed with us for the kids. And when we got home to empty the camper and take everything to the house. Love how the wheels move on their own and not with the handle, makes it easy to turn around and out of narrow spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS WAGON
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love this wagon! Idk how I lived this long without it. I love on the 3rd floor and always wanted a wagon because bringing groceries up by yourself SUCKS! This is the best money I have ever spent. No assembly required and easy to open and close. Can't wait to use in the summertime
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Von Matterhorn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this for business events/ parties and it works GREAT! I load it up inside with everything I need and simply wheel it out ot my car. There are handles on both sides that make lifting into a car easy. Ive even used it as a makeshift drink station filled with ice and it worked great. It collapses to fit into a small space when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Very tough and easy to work!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I accidentally ran mine over with the car when I forgot it was back there and I didn't put it in the trunk. Whoops! It still works perfectly. Very sturdy, hardly a scratch on it. I would highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this cart. I use it to take laundry back and forth to the laundry area for our apartment complex and to bring things to and from the car that are too heavy for me to carry anymore since I hurt my back.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie5270

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have used it to bring in groceries from the car, to bring items to the park for my young nephew to play with and countless other uses. I highly recommend this wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen A. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: This wagon saves me multiple trips
customer_reviews.text: I have a ways to carry my groceries to my apartment. Now when I go shopping I put it into my car and when I return home, I just get it out, load it up and get everything right into the house in one trip. It turns very easily so I can pull it right inside and up to my refrigerator, etc.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Works great hauling all the Costco shopping down the docks to ...
customer_reviews.text: This wagon has a handle long enough that I am not hitting my heals all the time. Works great hauling all the Costco shopping down the docks to the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Good for campaign, fishing (hunting) laundry and shopping
customer_reviews.text: It’s very convenient as is folding for very compact size and is quick and easy. The size is perfect for going in middle size elevator and corridors toward basements laundry. I love it . It’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Misho

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have used for several moves. Including small furniture. Also use for grocery shopping. Very sturdy very easy to maneuver even on carpet. Tires are large enough to clear 1 inch bumps. Not heavy at all, easy to pick up and put in my car etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Oakheart

customer_reviews.title: Love this little utility wagon
customer_reviews.text: Love this little utility wagon. My husband pulled my 2 year old grandson in it. We use it primarily for hauling stacks of wood while camping. The adjustable handle is convenient and makes it comfortable to use for me (5'6") as well as my husband who is 6'2. I also like the fact it folds up to the size of a briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great Wagon!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this. We use it in the yard when doing work and it helps us haul groceries from the car to the house. It folds up easily and compactly when not in use. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Windy City

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Cart
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time to bring my groceries from the garage to my front door - got all of them in at one shot - rolls beautifully! no assembly and very well made - I would highly recommend this cart!
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It has come in very handy. I am the only one who brings stuff in from the car, and often purchase many things.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maurice

customer_reviews.title: for heavy grocery shopping in NYC
customer_reviews.text: It's a life saver in Manhattan life. I walk 6 blocks to Trader Joe's and typically get 4 paper bags. It exactly accommodates them, and very easy to maneuver on the sidewalk. Compared to regular shopping carts, it's looks so much larger, but for me who carries gallons of liquid, I can deal with a little embarrassment on the city sidewalk for 15 min.
customer_reviews.author: nyc outsider

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is product that fits the bill for me. I have limited mobility and dragging groceries in from the car is (was) a pain. I used a laundry hamper, but that was hard to steer on the driveway. The cart is wonderful. Fits in the trunk with ease, opens and closes without effort. Glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: cyclestu

customer_reviews.title: Handy cart
customer_reviews.text: I love my little wagon and have used for to move everything from groceries to a dresser. I just ran into my only complaint. I had some meat juice leak from a shopping bag and get onto this and the fabric bottom feels to be hard cardboard and can’t be pulled out to be cleaned Really sturdy however
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by this wagon! We bought it for an up coming beach trip and when it arrived I wasn’t sure it would work. But sure it enough it was perfect. Held all our things, didnt “roll” great through the sand but we made it work.
customer_reviews.author: K.Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The best collapsable wagon ever for carting many things around!Glad I came across it and shipped quickley
customer_reviews.author: james l.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Great little wagon! I use it to lug around flowers and plants when I go to the market. It's super light weight and folds/unfolds very easily! There was also no assembly required which is nice. I definitely recommend the wagon especially if you live in the city.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college moves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use when moving my daughter into college. It easily held 2 full storage containers, and I still stacked stuff on top. Only 3 trips up and the move was done. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wagon. It is very easy to fold—I can easily do it with one hand. It also folds compactly so it fits anywhere. It has a high weight limit and is easy to pull and maneuver. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: love it! Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of heavy stuff without any issues. I don't think back wheels turn but still ok for stability. So far, love it! Very comfortable, easy to fold, easy to carry and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shilpa B.

customer_reviews.title: I love that it's light weight and fold super easy when ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had zero problems with this wagon! I love that it's light weight and fold super easy when not in use! Little smaller than I expected but definitely holds a lot plus my toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Save you back
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people asked where did I get this . It’s great to bring in all my groceries in from car. I live in apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It opens and closes really easily and folds up nicely for storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 85+ year old grandmother to use to transport her laundry basket back and forth to the laundry facility at her senior living complex. It opens and closes really easily and folds up nicely for storage. It rolls easily and is fairly maneuverable. Works great for her needs. It's a bit heavy for someone her age to lift but for most people that wouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver at farmers markets and for gardening! I use this all the time. It would make a great housewarming gift for an avid gardener or open air market lover.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: durable and easy storage
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my classroom and since September, two other teachers have bought it. Our book rooms are divided over several floors and we do not have book carts. This saves my wheeled desk chair :)
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon
customer_reviews.text: Am so pleased with this wagon. mainly use it to haul things to and from the car. Easy to use and holds so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in the city!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a car like most people in my city, so this wagon saved my life when it came to getting groceries and picking up 40lb bags of cat litter. I always got complimented on it at the store and my apartment complex. Little by little I saw some of the people who complimented it had gotten one too! It's easily foldable and collapsable.
customer_reviews.author: Kium

customer_reviews.title: Great. Get one. It's what you do when you get old lol
customer_reviews.text: Umm love this. Comes in handy. I even saw someone put their 4 year old in one recently who was asleep so they could go in the mall lol. Smh otherwise it's great for festivals and such.
customer_reviews.author: JCooper

customer_reviews.title: Our cookie wagon
customer_reviews.text: A great wagon that my girls use to sell their GS cookies around the neighborhood. It folds flat but does not stand up on its side well one flattened. It rolls well on sidewalks and jumps curbs and steps pretty well with a little tug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing for everything, my boys even pull each other in it. I only wish it had a break on the wheels so it would be easier to stand and store.
customer_reviews.author: 🌺Steph🌺

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! I live on the 4th floor of an apartment building and my apartment is the farthest away from the elevator so having this carry all my groceries for me is great! I love that it collapses nicely so I can put it in a closet and not have it take up a lot of room when I am not using it. 10 out of 10 would recommend 😁
customer_reviews.author: Bryna Parson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loaded it up with two fold up chairs, water bottles, and a backpack to take to an air show. Worked great. Love that it folds up and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This wagon arrived before the hurricane and was invaluable due to size (in and out of doors and down a narrow garden walkway) and weight. Maneuverability a plus for next spring's garden. Thank You. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Love this wagon
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer and deliver bags of groceries to those in need. I'm a senior and the wagon has been very beneficial. It maneuvers well, is sturdy, and easily closes. I wouldn't be able to do this work without it. I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joy H.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs stronger fabric
customer_reviews.text: Lighter weight, so easier to put in my car, than another brand I bought, but the material is a bit flimsy, and will probably wear holes easily
customer_reviews.author: abbie

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the back
customer_reviews.text: Giving it all 5 stars. Came at just the right time for bringing in the groceries to taking my dog out Hope it last a while
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wisenbaker

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it. This is my very review on amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed it. This is my very review on amazon after almost 2yrs i had amazon account. I do love this cart, its help me alot and save so much time for me. Ita cna fit 2 pack water and 2 boxes for soda and enough space for some bags
customer_reviews.author: Joy nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to handle
customer_reviews.text: I love this! IT helps me so much with groceries. I can handle it perfectly, although I am short and not very strong. It compacts pretty well and can tell it resits pressure. I'm proud of it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase in quite some time!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made in quite some time. 1st off---the price is great. Second the assembly was (what assembly?)--I think I hooked the handle on. I'm 73 yrs old and used it the same day I got it. That simple. Very light weight---I lift in and put it in my trunk and keep in there. It collapses that tight.. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Love my blue wagon.
customer_reviews.text: Love my wagon. Comes in handy when I do my grocery shopping. I can load 8 or 9 bags and roll from my parking garage to my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wagon From day 1 my grands and I have used it more and more. Carries toddlers and camping equipment. Getting groceries from the car to the house is much easier since we now have the wagon. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee N.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to store because it folds up very nicely
customer_reviews.text: This cart helps when I've got a lot of groceries and I cant carry them all. It has survived many long walking trips to the store and back. It is easy to store because it folds up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: We Love this wagon
customer_reviews.text: We love this wagon. We use it every Saturday morning for the farmers market!, Easy to maneuver, light weight, easy to clean, handle stays up with the onboard clip, cup holders, easy to fold up, easy to open. I'm a rockstar for buying it! LOL
customer_reviews.author: the terminator

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and super useful. I used it moving into my apartment and now keep it in my trunk to haul my groceries down the hall to my apartment. Bought one for My parents to use for the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I find it heavy! Lifting it out of the truck and back in. But it’s sturdy and rolls easy even over uneven ground
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Bell

customer_reviews.title: Light weight convenience
customer_reviews.text: We live in a third floor apartment and, even though there is an elevator, bringing up groceries and other supplies was difficult for us. We now keep the folding wagon in the car and it has made life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Martine

customer_reviews.title: Love this wagon
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon! I live in a condo and park quite a ways from my house. With this wagon I just load it up and roll it to my car or condo. Very easy to fold up and quite lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: melissa Berard

customer_reviews.title: This works well but
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to open and close. Does not carry as much as expected. The pull thing to close it broke after only 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Poppy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE the YSC Wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, rugged, and worked like a charm! Had it fully loaded & ready to go. My son just simply picked it up, (still had all the stuff in it) loaded it in the back of his Aunts SUV, and it was a perfect fit! At destination, still loaded, just took it out and wheeled to unit! GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Jax Native Gal

customer_reviews.title: useful wagon
customer_reviews.text: This darn wagon is my everything wagon! helps with unloading the groceries, helps with picking up yard items. Overall best little secret.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos ponte

customer_reviews.title: Great little wagon
customer_reviews.text: Love my little wagon. This makes it so much easier to get groceries from my car to my condo. Saves a great deal of leg work and eliminates the stress and strain on my back and legs. Would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: SouthernCharm

customer_reviews.title: Small wheels
customer_reviews.text: Nice wagon however it's hard to get up a curb..probably going to return it to get one with bigger wheels.
customer_reviews.author: southernmove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for living on the 5th floor in an apartment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for living on the 5th floor in an apartment! I keep it in my car for when I go shopping. I put everything in it when I get home and then roll it into the elevator and up to my apartment with ease.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever was buying this wagon
customer_reviews.text: Best idea ever was buying this wagon. I teach a lot of cake decorating classes and used to have to drag my supplies in multiple trips. This loads up easy and saves so much time!
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Kromminga

customer_reviews.title: I love this wagon
customer_reviews.text: I love this wagon! It is exactly as described in product & reviews. The only problem I had was shipping. This was a UPS problem not Amazon. It took a week to come from California across the states. UPS scanned in the package but immediately sent delay notice. It took over a week after this to receive the package. The UPS hub was an hour away from my location. The wagon is lightweight. Folds & unfolds quickly. I have used it for yardwork. It holds as much as a wheelbarrow but is so much easier to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. I live in a first floor apartment where we have no laundry facility in the apt. I have to walk about 10-15 feet to the laundry area. Good walk for me. I just put the the laundry in and go. I also use it for groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: No More Carrying Plastic Bags
customer_reviews.text: Did not think I would use it that often but I am using it on daily basis for hauling stuff. Very sturdy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Son

customer_reviews.title: I love this it's s so convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this it's s so convenient. I bought it to carry things to the beach. I live about 10 minutes away. No it doesn't roll great on the sand but who's expecting wagon to?
customer_reviews.author: Ayani

customer_reviews.title: It is so much better than the wagon or wheel barrows that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Was visiting my sister and used hers. It is so much better than the wagon or wheel barrows that I have used. Folds up, I can take it with me to plant sales. It is a work horse in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart. Would suggest it to anyone who moves items from one place to another. It’s portable, very easy to pack and unpack.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wise

customer_reviews.title: Size to weight ratio is terrific.
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this little cart is the light weight. The only minor dislike would be the relatively small wheels but in my case this doesn’t much matter because I don’t intend to use it at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Wudl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been hauling my photo equipment in this and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.com
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my sister who is a first year teacher, it’s a unbelievable help. It ride well on small stairs a so easy to transport
customer_reviews.author: Shiikiss

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Saves my back!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use . Light enough to get out of the trunk. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: I love this wagon. It makes getting groceries from my car into my apartment so much easier! No more loading up my arms as much as possible trying to only make one trip or having bags break between the car and apartment. It’s also good for moving heavy packages and boxes.
customer_reviews.author: jrr66

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great wagon. I am using a lot for transfer shopping to home.
customer_reviews.author: inessa shor

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy when full
customer_reviews.text: I fill this to the brim to bring class supplies to a local park and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Gardner

product_meta.title: YSC Wagon Garden Folding Utility Shopping Cart,Beach Red (Navy Blue) (Regular, Navy Blue)
product_meta.description: This wagon is super light weight compare to the all other wagons in the market. It only has slightly more than 10 lbs, so it's good for female shoppers. There is no assembly required - Just un-fold and GO! but it still has 150 lbs weight capacity. It's an ideal cart to serve multiple purposes, shopping, beach fun, and gardening etc.
feature_bullets: No Assembly Required, Just unfold and GO!
Strong solid frame construction and durable 600 Denier Polyester fabric
Folds conveniently and compactly and stores easy
Consciously designed for individuals with back pain, weak muscle strength. Extreme Light weight for everyday usage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars379 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
